This innovative project one first focus effort within community improve diabetes control prevent diabetes progression cook nutrition well systematically measure clinical behavioral outcome .
DOC.brief_title: Cooking Nutrition Education Health Among Adults With Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Age 18 year old Current State Ohio Medicaid recipient Current diagnosis diabetes , report electronic medical record Completed least one diabetes education visit STJHC Have daily access functional kitchen home Pregnancy lactation plan pregnant lactate study Current alcoholism abuse recreational drug Selfreported history HIV hepatitis active tuberculosis Travel plan permit full participation especially first 8 study visit Recent unexplained weight loss ( 10 pound past 3 month ) Any diagnosis would interfere prevent change diet
